# Github

Our lab primarily uses Github for version control. There are many resources for learning how to use Github. A few include: 

* [Happy Git and GitHub for the useR](https://happygitwithr.com/). 
* [Learn Git branching](https://learngitbranching.js.org/). 
* [NCEAS Github training](https://nceas.github.io/training-git-intro/getting-started-with-git-rstudio.html).
